response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's time to explore a mutually beneficial arrangement. We propose to offer this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000. This figure reflects not only the product's intrinsic worth but also acknowledges its importance to you. We trust this proposal will be favorable and look forward to discussing the details further. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please do not hesitate to contact us immediately.", "product_price": 950000}
